notes:
use the "mouse wheel" to zoom
in and out in the project

drag the smiley face from the
toolbar to make a new character

hold shift whilst editing a tile
to restrict your drawing to within
that tile

press "space" to change to a
random colour for drawing

you can draw on characters
just like tiles

use the number keys (1, 2, 3, ...)
to change the brush size

script tags that are not understood
by kooltool will be ignored and can
be used at notes to yourself!

hold s and click on a character to
show or hide their personal script

create new script tags by dragging
them into the project from the
toolbar, just like characters

use the tilebar on the right of the
screen to select a tile to place

attach script tags to characters
by dragging them onto their
personal script

kooltool is available for free download, ask for a card
or just google "kooltool"!

read the documentation online
or look at these examples to
understand scripting

  better tutorial to come!
click to place tiles

use the toolbar on the left of the
screen to select the drawing tool

play your game by clicking on
the bottom-most button on the
toolbar

and move them around using
the topmost tool on the
toolbar

you can set walls using the walls
tool on toolbar
draw on the tiles
(you can export distributable games in the non-demonstration version!!)
make something cute and tweet it under #kooltool

hold "alt" and click to copy
the colour under the mouse

hold "right click" and drag the
mouse to move around the project
(press escape to stop)

kooltool is a simple tool
for making scrappy games

hold "x" and click
to erase tiles
you are now editing a game

hold ctrl when you start drawing
on a tile to edit a copy of it
